website_summaries.verdict: A good option if you want a quality compression shirt without spending a lot of money.
pros: Incorporates impressive features that include sleek, stay-cool stretch fabric, moisture wicking, and 30+ UPF sun protection for unbeatable performance
cons: It runs a bit small on some individuals, but it's available in sizes all the way up to triple X

customer_reviews.title: seam on sleeves are uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: overall good shirt as expected. only problem is the seam on sleeves are very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DKid

customer_reviews.title: Amour All Compression Gear
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn anything like this before. Im old school cotton heavy etc. I picked up a bad cold mountain biking on a cool day because I was sweating then I would stop (my 3 year old boy was with me on an attached tug a bike) and I would get the chills because of the dampness. After I got over the cold I realized I needed the rite eqipment/clothing for the job. Clothing that lifts the wet away from you and keeps you dry. Amour All compression gear is definitely for cooler days. Say 60's. Too warm in 70's.
customer_reviews.author: j.r. rader

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son and he absolutely loves it. I have bought him several more since. Great product and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend wanted one of these shirt and it fit him ...
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend wanted one of these shirt and it fit him exact, if you don't want it to close get a size up from your regular size.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you VERY cool if there's any breeze
customer_reviews.text: Compresses tight. Keeps you VERY cool if there's any breeze. Black attracts the Sun though so keep that in mind.

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good. Shirt is pretty long
customer_reviews.text: Ordered M (usually between S and M). Fit is good. Shirt is pretty long, and sleeves are quite long as you can see in the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shirt.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for working out at the gym. Fits well and prevents you from getting chilled if you sweat a lot while working out and your gym is heavily air-conditioned, as mine is.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: If you want a real good fitted compression tee then measure your chest size and look for the sizing chart and enjoy seeing yourself in front of any mirror(gym,house,others), you will definitely loveyour body more. This seller is awesome. Product reached destination well before first due date. Serious people, will definitely do business again.

customer_reviews.title: I typically don't like wearing a ton of heavy outdoor gear heading to ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly warm and keeps me warm when the weather gets very cold outside. I use it for my workout session at the gym. I typically don't like wearing a ton of heavy outdoor gear heading to the gym and this under Armour helps reduce the amount of clothing I need when I am outside.

customer_reviews.title: Like it!

customer_reviews.text: Great for sports such as running and biking. Helps keep you cool during hot days and it's nice not to have to apply sunscreen.

customer_reviews.title: Great compression shirt
customer_reviews.text: I run all of my OCR races in this shirt. It has never failed me. Wicks water quickly. Help my upper body recover faster from the obstacles. It truly is one of those articles I have come to rely on heavily.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT! Keeps you cool and dry
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! Keeps you cool and dry. Easy to wash and maintain! Compression make you sleep like a baby with reduced soreness next day!

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly fine. Thumbs
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner, fits perfectly fine. Thumbs up

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It is very warm. Sticks onto the body perfectly. Also perfect in soccer games. I recommend this item to anyone who plays sports

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little tight
customer_reviews.text: Item fits a little tight but it's made for compression just like the label states it on the back. So far it feels good but haven't made the big jump for all day wear. I feel like a stuffed sausage in it but I think I'm also a little fat for it. Not the s***s fault but rather my mouths fault. I have to say that I do like the quality and it has not shrunk any more that the first day I got it. Well, time for me to hit the gym and look like I'm suppose to in this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M

customer_reviews.title: Flattering shirt. Works well as a base layer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shirt for my spouse to wear as a warm layer when he rides his motorcycle. He loved this shirt. It also shows off his muscular build, like the picture. It fits snug, so if you want it loose, order a size up.

customer_reviews.title: Great as always: UA

customer_reviews.title: I love Under Armour of the "skin tight compression" variety
customer_reviews.text: I love Under Armour of the "skin tight compression" variety... not the bulky sweatshirt with a UA logo. So I think this shirt is perfect. I only wish I had more so I could alternate them more often without washing it so much.
customer_reviews.author: hellimedic

customer_reviews.title: This product fits great and does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This product fits great and does a great job, but holds dirt very easily. I washed this every day after wearing it, and still the cuffs of the sleeves went gray within a week, even when freshly washed. Next time I will probably buy a black one, so it won't show the dirt as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.text: This shirt is the best. It really delivers pass expectations. I am glad I came across this .It does exactly what it was meant to do.

customer_reviews.title: ... fits a bit tighter than expected it is so comfortable it soon feels as if you are not wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this fits a bit tighter than expected it is so comfortable it soon feels as if you are not wearing it at all. It fits like a soft, extra layer of skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Men's HeatGear Undershirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these undershirts. He says they really are comfortable and keep the heat in especially these unusual cold late winter days we are having in the South. Forest Green is his alma mater color!

customer_reviews.title: I wore it two weeks

customer_reviews.title: keeps you cool or warm depending on the temperature

customer_reviews.text: I use this as an undershirt for work mostly because I cut up my arms, protects well but I still get pretty hot and I work stocking freezers.

customer_reviews.title: Is what it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice, tight, and cool. Does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crews

customer_reviews.title: Makes every bit of air feel cool and wonderful on a hot day or while working/sweating hard.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this under my dirt bike pads and gear and it keeps me sooo cool and dry. You don't realize how nice under armour is until you try it. It fits snug to your body, doesn't have any tags or itchy seams. This is a top quality product and if you're working in the heat or overheating ever, just get this and wear it. Every breeze will feel like a cool wonderful chill.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend buying this product if your goal is to stay cool
customer_reviews.text: This definitely keeps you cool. You don't fee like sweaty, does a great job wicking moisture away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: UA is The Way
customer_reviews.text: I cant think of a better compression shirt when doing all things athletic. i wear mine to the gym as an under layer and the way this makes me feel is unmeasureable. The quality and workmanship is is absolute. This compression shirt keeps my muscles tight and warm when weight-lifting and keeps the sweat from seeping through my underlaying garments. I strongly recommend UA for this item
customer_reviews.author: MusicMan

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Medium, which normally fits great. No problem with other UA products in that size. But this was so small I couldn't even get it on all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie L. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shirt
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hot weather workouts or gym workouts. Small compression for muscles provides a little more endurance. The intent is to try wearing it under a football uniform when it gets a little cooler outside. Fabric does not seem durable and white allows nipples to show through. Please do not wear this product if you have moobs.
customer_reviews.author: Grifter

customer_reviews.title: Hot days are oh so cool
customer_reviews.text: I work on the construction of a highway where temperatures soar over 30 degrees The protection from the heat and sun's rays makes this an integral part of my gear, this is my second such shirt and I will certainly be getting more.

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour The Best!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great shirt to run in, it fits good and definitely would recommend it to anyone that likes to run outside when its cold.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Heat Wear
customer_reviews.text: The compression shirts fit and confirm well to the body. Did not receive five stars because it is not as good for keeping the person warm during the winter than I expected. Note that it does not have a collar which is present in other models and useful in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to wear on warm/hot days while cycling. It works exactly as expected. The compression helps me maintain my cycling position, I don't overheat because the sleeves get damp with sweat and generates a cooling effect with the wind. I wear a cycling vest over it. I have a small and have a 35/36 inch chest.

customer_reviews.title: Still happy with the purchase

customer_reviews.title: Compression is good. Thermal protection only ok. Runs long

customer_reviews.title: It fits okay
customer_reviews.text: The arms are too long. Perhaps it's because I followed the sizing chart instead of buying my regular size. This shirt was sealed in a plastic bag. The moment I put it on, I could feel small balls all around (i.e., it wasn't smooth like my other Under Armour shirts). I don't know if it's because it was made in a different country, but I'd rather stick to my older shirts.

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HeatGear Sonic Compression L/S Tee
product_meta.description: Stay cool and comfortable during your workout with the Under Armour Men's Heat Gear Sonic Compression Long Sleeve Shirt. The soft, lightweight rib fabric delivers amazing next to skin comfort while still wicking away sweat to keep you dry and cool.
feature_bullets: Smooth fabric provides extreme comfort and compression without restriction
4-way stretch fabrication allows greater mobility and maintains shape
Signature Moisture Transport System wicks sweat away from the body
Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor causing microbes
30+ UPF protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays
